attributes.review: I downloaded the app to celebrate the birth of my dead grandma cause she wanted to give her daughter a mother days gift and it raped my cousin and told them to take half a penny and leave the white house on sesame streets. ALONE. I couldnt believe the app abandoned a 12 year old grown man with a wife and kids on a airplane going to the Bermuda Triangle. Not only that but the amount of icloud space it took on my computer after getting it on my android made my ios 13 act like a cockroach on febreze. DO NOT GET THE APP. IT IS ABSOLUTELY THE WORST THING EVER.
